Class GraphReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.graph.ml.GraphReader

  • public final class GraphReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A GraphMLReader for reading an extended graph from a GraphML file.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
